ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia was nearly impressed by the condition of the ship, but he fealt a flaw about it s leader, what kind of leader crashes his ship on it s first mission?

Phobia was nearly impressed by the condition of the ship, but he 
fealt a flaw about it's leader, what kind of leader crashes his ship 
on it's first mission?

the words "fully functional" echoed in Phobias ears,this ship could 
be the edge the Maximals need to save this planet, the only problem 
would be getting it to fly again. That would be a problem for the 
techbots not him, and the problem at hand had to be discussed first.

"I understand your precautions, I'd probably do no less if the 
situation were reversed." He knew better though. if the situation 
were reversed a predicon would have blown them to bits by now and 
taken the information. The spider was glad that the Maximals were 
diplomatic creatures.

"If at all possible I would like you're science officer, your 
tactical officer, and every available Maximal leader in on our 
conference.

(If your answers yes then arrange temporary quarters for Phobia 
somewhere, if you don't trust him then I'm sure you have room in the 
brig until the meeting.)

(If your answers no then)"Do you at least have someone available with 
knowledge of temporal physics?" Phobia asks, confident that the 
question just stumped Kluster. "We will need them present, I'm not 
all that great with history."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/Kluster::
> 
> Zardus shakes his head. "No questions. Please proceed."
> 
> Zardus looks around the room. This was not a ship to mess with, he 
decides as 
> he follows Panzertron.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster grins. "Its a great ship. This is actually its first 
mission. Other 
> than the engines, it's fully functional."
> 
> They reach the entrance, the hatch opening for them. Kluster looks 
at Phobia.
> 
> "For security reasons, you'll be fully monitored by the scanners 
while you're 
> inside. If you act fine, nothing'll happen."
> 
> Kluster turns a corner. "The conference room is this way."
